data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Njombe, Tanzania.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Njombe, Tanzania
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Njombe.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Njombe, Tanzania.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: the state of Njombe has (about) 77,159 people who know Jesus, 281,711 people who know about him culturally, and 343,230 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Safwa people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Njombe, Tanzania to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 77,159 believers find a person of peace today among the 624,941 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Njombe to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
